description: A dashboard that monitors OpenCost and focuses on namespace costs. It is created using the [opencost-mixin](https://github.com/adinhodovic/opencost-mixin).

targets.expr: avg(finops_efficiency_score{exported_namespace="$namespace", job="finops-api"})
finops_anomaly_score{exported_namespace="$namespace", job=~"finops-api"}

avg(
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) - 
  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))
) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) * 100
avg(finops_resource_waste{exported_namespace="$namespace", resource_type="memory", job="finops-api"})

sum(
  (
    sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"})
    by (namespace, instance)
    * on(instance) group_left()
    (avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (instance) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024) * 730)
  )
  +
  (
    sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"})
    by (namespace, instance)
    * on(instance) group_left()
    (avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (instance) * 730)
  )
) by (namespace)
finops_cost_forecast{exported_namespace="$namespace", job=~"finops-api"}
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)

panels.title: Memory Usage vs Requests vs Limits

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"})
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"})
